definition: skillful in/proficient in/adept at
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
surname Yu
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]
in/at/to/from/by/than/out of
to be proficient in the area of/skilled in this field
mastery of study lies in diligence (idiom). You can only master a subject by assiduous study./Excellence in work is only possible with diligence./Practice makes perfect.

sentences.english: I hope that I can excel in anything I study.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我能专精于我所读的任何东西。

sentences.english: He was a man of much worldly wisdom, and in some ways resembled Voltaire.
sentences.chinese: 他精于人情世故，在某些方面酷似伏尔泰。

sentences.english: Mr. A is far from being good at computer software.
sentences.chinese: 先生决非精于电脑的软体。

sentences.english: Offworld Ishi Tib are known for their devotion to nature, and for their excellent managerial skills.
sentences.chinese: 离乡在外的伊希提卜人以崇拜自然，精于管理而闻名。

sentences.english: So that each man practicing his own which is one, will not become many but one.
sentences.chinese: 所以一个人可以专精于一件事，而非多件。

sentences.english: The Japanese are calculating, cunning, and wicked.
sentences.chinese: 日本人是精于算计的，狡猾的，缺德的。

sentences.english: As a result, historically SLAs have specialized in savings deposits and mortgage lending.
sentences.chinese: 因此，存贷款社长期专精于储蓄账户和抵押借贷。

sentences.english: "Balenciaga"Fashion has always been good at cutting and sewing.
sentences.chinese: “巴黎世家”服装一向是精于裁剪和缝制。

sentences.english: Especially is Dennie good at swimming.
These lightly armed and armoured swordsmen are adept at raiding and looting.
sentences.chinese: 格温特突袭者挥舞长剑，轻装上阵，精于劫掠和突击。

sentences.english: Time is a dressmaker, specializing in alterations.
sentences.chinese: 时间是一位精于修改的裁缝。

sentences.english: Kanon, we visualize customer's marketingncept and exhibiting elements.
sentences.chinese: 卡能，精于将客户的营销理念与展示要素完美结合。

sentences.english: Dictionary writer must is skilled in the art of definition.
sentences.chinese: 编纂者必须精于给词语下定义的技巧。

sentences.english: Danny used to be a short-con artist who excelled at card tricks and pick- pocketing .
sentences.chinese: 丹尼曾是小拐小骗方面的艺术家，精于牌戏和摸包。

sentences.english: Shirov is both a representative of romantic chess and an endgame virtuoso.
sentences.chinese: 希罗夫既是浪漫派的代表又是一个精于残局的大师。

sentences.english: Proficient in the quarter of the rationale for Mr. painting paintings into books, and on natural changes in density.
sentences.chinese: 精于画理的季先生以画入书，疏密变化天成而就。
